?

<ma=
rcelo_javier_ruiz@...> wrote:
> Hi All,
> I need to run some long =
multithreaded load tests with JUnit, but I find the tests fail before compl=
etion at exactly 1200 seconds. Is this a global timeout JUnit has? I'm anno=
tating the test with @Test(timeout =3D xxxxx) to try to bypass this restric=
tion, but it's not working.
> Any suggestions to make this work?
> Thanks a=
